title: Defense spending breakdown of the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2017/18 - 2018/19
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Expenditure in billion GBP on the Y-axis for 5 different Defense Categorys for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
Among all the Defense Categorys, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 in Defense Category Military defense and lowest value 44.0 in Defense Category Civil defense.
Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense had the biggest gap of 37936.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP found for 2018/19.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Expenditure in billion GBP on the Y-axis for 5 different Defense Categorys for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Expenditure in billion GBP on the Y-axis for 5 different Defense Categorys for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
Among all the Defense Categorys, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 in Defense Category Military defense and lowest value 44.0 in Defense Category Civil defense.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Expenditure in billion GBP on the Y-axis for 5 different Defense Categorys for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
Among all the Defense Categorys, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP in Defense Category Military defense and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP in Defense Category Civil defense.
There is a gap of 37936.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP found for 2018/19 in Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense.
Among the groups, 2017/18 had the biggest difference in Expenditure in billion GBP. Where the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP was 260.06 times larger than the minimum Expenditure in billion GBP.

On average, the Defense Category Military defense had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP for all 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. Whereas Civil defense had the lowest average Expenditure in billion GBP.
